Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends Object
    Represents a deck of 52 playing cards.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int CARDS_IN_DECK 
      private ArrayList<Card> deck 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Default constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCard(ArrayList<Card> cards)
      This alternate addCard() method can add multiple cards held in an array list to the deck.
      void addCard(Card other)
      The addCard() method adds a card to the bottom of the deck.
      int cardsRemaining()
      The cardsRemaining() method returns the number of cards in the deck.
      Card dealCard()
      The dealCard() method removes the top card from the deck.
      void freshDeck()
      The freshDeck() method creates a fresh deck of 52 cards.
      boolean isEmpty()
      The isEmpty() method checks if the deck is empty.
      static void main(String[] args) 
      void shuffle()
      The shuffle() method shuffles the full 52 card deck.
      Deck splitDeck()
      The splitDeck() method takes the deck and splits it in two, returning the other half as a seperate deck.
      String toString()
      The toString() method returns a formatted string showing all of the cards within the deck.

    • Method Detail

      • freshDeck

        public void freshDeck()
        The freshDeck() method creates a fresh deck of 52 cards.

      • dealCard

        public Card dealCard()
        The dealCard() method removes the top card from the deck.
        Returns:
        The card at the top of the deck

      • addCard

        public void addCard(Card other)
        The addCard() method adds a card to the bottom of the deck.
        Parameters:
        other - The card to be added to the bottom of the deck

      • addCard

        public void addCard(ArrayList<Card> cards)
        This alternate addCard() method can add multiple cards held in an array list to the deck.
        Parameters:
        cards - Collection of cards to be added to the deck

      • cardsRemaining

        public int cardsRemaining()
        The cardsRemaining() method returns the number of cards in the deck.
        Returns:
        The number of cards in the deck

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        The shuffle() method shuffles the full 52 card deck.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        The isEmpty() method checks if the deck is empty.
        Returns:
        True if the deck is empty, false if it is not

      • splitDeck

        public Deck splitDeck()
        The splitDeck() method takes the deck and splits it in two, returning the other half as a seperate deck.
        Returns:
        The other half of the deck.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        The toString() method returns a formatted string showing all of the cards within the deck.
